### Senior Leadership Development Consultant

**Reference Number:** cb-453-55436329
**Amendment Number:** 1
**Solicitation Number:** W2282-23-AA159
**Publication Date:** 2024-03-25
**Tender Closing Date:** 2024-04-12 14:00:00
**Expected Contract Start Date:** 2024-05-20
**Expected Contract End Date:** 2025-03-31

### Tender Description

The Department of National Defence (DND) invites interested bidders to provide Senior Leadership Development Consultant services to support the Director General Military Careers (DGMC) in the development of succession planning and talent management policies and programs.

The successful consultant will work closely with the DGMC to:

* Develop and implement succession planning and talent management strategies
* Identify and developleadership talent to support future organizational needs
* Provide coaching and mentoring to key leaders and executives

### Requirements and Evaluation Criteria

The successful bidder will be selected based on the highest combined rating of technical merit and price. Evaluation criteria will include:

* Technical Merit (40%): Demonstrated experience and expertise in succession planning, talent management, and leadership development
* Price (60%): The total price for the services to be provided

### Procurement and Trade Agreements

This procurement is subject to the World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA), the North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA), the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), and other applicable trade agreements.

### Region of Opportunity and Delivery

The services will be provided in the National Capital Region (NCR), with a focus on Ottawa.
